item.battleroyale.medkit.tooltip.use: Hold right-click to heal 12 health points
item.battleroyale.bandage.tooltip.use: Hold right-click to heal 4 health points
item.battleroyale.regeneration_syringe.t: Regeneration Syringe supplies for emergency healing
Hold right-click to get healing static
item.battleroyale.chameleon.tooltip: It's a chameleon! Become the chameleon to gain invisibility but leave footprints! (Taking damage cancels invisibility!)
item.battleroyale.chameleon.use_success: You are now invisible but leaving footprints. Taking damage will cancel this effect!
item.battleroyale.armor_plate_1.tooltip: Basic Armor Plate, offering fundamental protection
item.battleroyale.armor_plate_2.tooltip: Improved Armor Plate, an upgrade to the basic model, offering improved damage resistance and durability
item.battleroyale.armor_plate_3.tooltip: Advanced Armor Plate, crafted from superior materials and cutting-edge technology, it offers significantly enhanced protection
item.battleroyale.armor_plate_4.tooltip: Ultra Armor Plate, forged by master artisans, its exceptional quality delivers paramount protection
item.battleroyale.phase_core.tooltip: A magical core containing spatio-temporal power, allowing for brief spatial travel
item.battleroyale.phase_core.tooltip.use: Hold right-click to phase forward, press R to return or you'll be forced back after 5 seconds
item.battleroyale.phase_core.use_success: Phase started! Press R to return to the original position, or you'll be forced back after 5 seconds...
item.battleroyale.phase_core.trace_back: Teleportation ended, returned to original position!
